definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sing (Ar. gan=a sing, chant, gina0’un singing, chanting, etc.; Syr. 9aniy sing responsively, 9uwniyto0 hymn, refrain; poss. As. enû, resound (?); Egypt. anni is loan-word acc. to Bondi:80);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְעָנוּ]] consec. Je 51:14; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעַנֶה]] Je 25:30; 3 fs. [[וַתַּעַן]] Ex 15:21; 3 fpl. [[וַתַּעֲנֶינׇה]] 1Sa 18:7, etc.; Imv. [[עֱנוּ]] Nu 21:17, Ps 147:7; Inf. cstr. [[עֲנוֹת]] Ex 32:18; Ex 32:18; —sing, utter tunefully, Ex 15:21 (E) and Miriam sang to ([[ל]]) them; of uttering shout ([[הֵידָד]]), as in vintage Je 25:30 (´[[י]] subj.; + [[אֶל־]] pers.), in attack Je 51:14 (+ [[עַל־]] pers.); ([[חֲלוּשָׁה]]) [[קוֹל עֲנוֹת גְּבוּרָה]] Ex 32:18, Ex 32:18 (E); c. [[ל]] rei vel pers. laudat. Nu 21:17 (JE; well); Ps 147:7 (´[[י]]; ‖[[זַמְּרוּ]]), Ezr 3:11; + [[אָמַר]] 1Sa 18:7 the women sang, and said; [[יַעֲנוּ בַמְּחׂלוֹת לֵאמׂר]] 1Sa 21:12, 1Sa 29:5; c. acc. rei laudat. Ps 119:172 (cf. ‖ v:Ps 119:171).—Is 14:22 v. [[עון]]

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: intens.: Imv. [[עַנּוּ־לָהּ]] Is 27:2 sing sweetly of it; Inf. [[קוֹל עַנּוֹת]] Ex 32:18 (E) the sound of distinct singing; cf. [[לְעַנּוֹת]] Ps 88:1.
